page.title: 17SCIPLINO FAMILY DAY
page.content: At 7.15am the whole family gets up.Mum takes Robert to the station at 8.10am.Robert is a barrister and goes to the superior courts in London such as the Old Bailey.Mum comes back and picks us up (the children) whom she's left at home because we need to get organised for school. This we reach about 8.45.After Prayers we work.While we're at school Mum makes the beds,tidies,goes out shopping and visits her friends.Mum picks us up at 3.30pm and we go home. If necessary I do my homework or I play with my friends, usually cycling. We have tea at 6pm.At 7.30pm Mum collects Robert from Cheddington Station.At 8pm we have showers, go to bed and read till 9pm. During the week we tend to have convenience foods but Mum cooks proper meals at the weekends.
